sentences.en: Asterisk Cracker is designed for the hidden with asterisks fields scanning.
sentences.cn: 星号脆饼被设计为躲,星号地扫描.

sentences.en: Buy me some peanuts and Cracker Jack . And some more . And more.
sentences.cn: 帮我买些花生和焦糖爆米花,多一点、再多一点.

sentences.en: I'm sorry to tell you the ballet Nut Cracker has been cancelled.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉告诉您芭蕾舞剧《胡桃夹子》的演出被取消了.

sentences.en: Look at the heart - shaped cracker. It is special!
sentences.cn: 你看这块心型的饼乾, 好特别!

sentences.en: Never mind what he says, he's a cracker.
sentences.cn: 不要理他说什么, 他是疯疯癫癫的.

sentences.en: Sparks fly out the moment a fire cracker falls to the ground.
sentences.cn: 摔炮落地的瞬间,火星迸射.

sentences.en: The best your pension'll buy us is some crappy little cracker box on the Eastern shore!
sentences.cn: 你的养老金顶多在东海岸买座烂房子!

sentences.en: The fuss fizzled out before exploding the fire cracker.
sentences.cn: 鞭炮还没点燃,引线就灭了.

sentences.en: There was a cracker beside every place at the table.
sentences.cn: 桌上每个位置旁都有彩包爆竹.

sentences.en: Try a graham cracker or bowl of cereal.
sentences.cn: 试试看全麦饼干或者一碗麦片.

sentences.en: What a little cracker she is!
When he lit the cracker it exploded with a bang.
sentences.cn: 他点燃爆竹后,它砰地一声炸开了.

sentences.en: Who wants to pull this cracker with me?

sentences.cn: 你和他们就是一伙的不是 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 爆竹；饼干；胡桃钳；解密高手

phrases.tran_cn: 坚果破壳器，坚果脱壳机；胡桃钳

trans.tran_cn: 薄脆饼干，爆竹，好东西，黑客
trans.tran_en: a hard dry type of bread in small flat shapes, that is often eaten with cheese
